title: Akira Nakao (boxer)
text: was a Japanese <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a>. He was eliminated in the quarter-finals of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20bantamweight">bantamweight class</a> after losing his fight to the eventual bronze medalist <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Villanueva%20%28boxer%29">José Villanueva</a>.
